underlying_goal: Fix SSH authentication errors when connecting to GCP instances via kubectl-local-mesh, and ultimately restructure the gcloud-to-Go-SDK migration as an experimental feature behind a flag
friction_detail: Two successive SSH fixes (SUDO_USER, OS Login username/cert) failed to resolve the authentication issue, leading user to abandon the approach and request a flag-based fallback to the original gcloud CLI.
brief_summary: User reported persistent SSH errors after migrating from gcloud CLI to Go SDK; Claude attempted multiple fixes but none fully resolved the issue, so user pivoted to making the Go SDK path an experimental flag with gcloud as default.
